channel.title: Frozen Car Modification - Single Joystick Drive
channel.description:
Here is a link to an Instructables Manual that was created by FIRST Robotics Team 1939. This manual describes how to add power steering and joystick drive to a standard Fisher Price Frozen PowerWheels Car (or any other standard PowerWheels car). This was a complex modification, but it was a lot of fun.
[LINK TO MANUAL](http://www.instructables.com/id/Frozen-Car-Modification/)![Frozen|620x413](/uploads/gbgconnect/original/1X/73005ceacfc5edd01f2c587d2318108c460bf9fa.jpg)
